name: treatment
description: The collection of data elements related to a donor's treatment at a specific point in the clinical record. To submit multiple treatments for a single donor, please submit treatment rows in the treatment file for this donor.

fields.name: submitter_donor_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider

fields.name: submitter_treatment_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the treatment, assigned by the data provider

fields.name: submitter_diagnosis_id
fields.description: Indicate the diagnosis event in the clinical timeline that this treatment was related to

fields.name: treatment_type
fields.description: Indicate the type of treatment the donor received

fields.name: treatment_is_primary
fields.description: Indicate if the treatment is the primary treatment following the initial diagnosis

fields.name: treatment_response
fields.description: The donor's response to the treatment

meta.notes: The DIN uniquely identifies the manufacturer, product name, active ingredient(s), strength(s) of active ingredient(s);pharmaceutical form and route of administration.

fields.name: medication_class
fields.description: Drug class based on ATC (Anatomical Therapeutic Class)

meta.notes: Refer to the WHO ATC https://www.whocc.no/atc_ddd_index/ to classify the active ingredients of drug according to the organ or system on which it acts and its therapeutic, pharmacological and chemical properties. Drugs should be coded at the 5th level of the ATC.

fields.description: Date of the first prescription dispensation (MM-YYYY)
fields.name: medication_start_date

meta.notes: For self-reported information provide date when stopped taking the Rx.

fields.description: Date of the last prescription dispensation (MM-YYYY)
fields.name: medication_end_date

meta.notes: For self-reported information provide date when stopped taking the Rx.
